about_the_game:
Welcome to Acid Trip!


ACID TRIP is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and skull-crushing close combat and defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d.


KILL, destroy, fuck up zombies. Oh, and look good to your friends by smashing their scores on the leaderboards.

STORY:

You’ve come here for a reason. they are to friends working on new year eve so one of them put acid in candy 🍬 and they took it without knowing so they took an overdose and the hungover started the game take place in their mind tripping and making them imagine they are in a zombie apocalypse and If they die in there mind they die in the real world.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Back-Breaking , Challenging Gameplay

  • purchase Perks and upgrades to Kill, destroy, fuck up zombies more brutality!!!

  • Endless Possibilities and a variety of powerups

  • Fast-paced gameplay that will make the bones in your hands shatter!!!

  • Leaderboards to prove you're better than the rest of the world, or at least your friends!

  • Dodge, shoot, and destroy 8 challenging multi-form bosses

  • Intense sound design with gurgling zombies and all that shit!

  • Intense Musical Accompaniment

reviews:
“Acid Trip is a game that needs to be experienced to be believed. From the moment you start playing, you're transported to a world of neon lights, surreal landscapes, and mind-bending puzzles that will keep you coming back for more. What sets Acid Trip apart from other games is its attention to detail. The pixel art graphics are stunning, with vibrant colors and intricate designs that make every level a feast for the eyes. The sound design is equally impressive, with a pulsating electronic soundtrack that perfectly complements the fast-paced action. But Acid Trip isn't just a visual and auditory masterpiece. The gameplay is addictively fun and challenging, with endless hordes of enemies to shoot down and multiple ways to kill them for extra points. The game's weapons and power-ups are diverse and fun to use, adding to the overall excitement and challenge. What's more impressive is the game's tactical depth. Players must strategize and plan their attacks carefully to survive and rack up high scores. The game's levels are filled with hidden secrets and challenges that reward exploration and experimentation, making each game a unique experience. Overall, Acid Trip is a game that is truly deserving of a 10/10 rating. It's a rare gem that combines stunning visuals, immersive sound design, and addictive gameplay into a package that is sure to delight gamers of all skill levels. If you're looking for a game that will challenge you, entertain you, and transport you to another world, then Acid Trip is the game for you.”
10/10 – metacritic
